name: Butlins Bognor Regis Resort

reviews.text: I had been to Minehead Butlins, and found that very dated, but lots to do. So was excited to try the new Hotels at Bognor. We were greeted very nicely on the gate and then pointed us to our butlers at the Ocean Hotel. The Butlers did say we were a bit early as we arrived at 11.50 am, but was pleasantly surprised that when we went to reception, our room was ready for us. (We initially thought check in was 3pm).
reviews.title: Well Done Butlins!!!!

reviews.text: The room was FAB. Nicely decorated with glowing lights above the bed and over the bath. The kids had their own TV in their room and a nice Elephant towel arrangement made us feel very welcome.
reviews.title: We came home a day early...enough said!

reviews.text: We stayed for the 4 days - Monday to Friday. Staying in the Ocean Hotel meant that we had three activities included in our package. Fencing, Archery and fun bikes. We did all but the fencing and enjoyed them.
reviews.title: Can't Complain, But Can't Be Effusive With Praise Either

reviews.text: Meals in the hotel were lovely. Lots of choice and there were also a choice of 4 other restaurants if you fancied a choice. Just see your Butler and they would give you a voucher. We used the Kaleidoscope restaurant most of the week. But went to Turners on the last night for a treat. The food was Excellent.
reviews.title: The holiday from hell

reviews.text: Entertainment - There were a couple of very good shows over the week. The Panto was a bit boring for us adults. I would have liked to have seen more shows, but can't complain.
reviews.title: OK, very dated..

reviews.text: I used to be a regular customer of Butlins when my children were growing up, now grown up and with children of their own i thought i would arrange a family holiday with my grandaughter experiencing her first taste of Butlins at the age of 6.....The resort has definately changed big time and trying hard to move with the times without losing that Butlins touch...
reviews.title: Family weekend....

reviews.text: I advise people to book early and save money. I originally got a quote to sort out costs for others in the party only to actually go to book a week later to find the prices had jumped by £70 per unit....
reviews.title: Tired....outdated in places

reviews.text: Stayed at the Atlantic Bay Silver Accommodation and units were improved and much more modern. With five in my party there was plenty of room, though we were not in the room very much, pretty much to sleep and get changed later in the day...Pre hired cot was not in the room on arrival but was soon sorted out by staff.
reviews.title: One of the worst places I have ever stayed

reviews.text: Food.. bit pricey in some areas Will go half board if i ever return Will save on costs and deciding where to eat to please all tastes..Drinks were costly too in all venues.
reviews.title: Oh Butlins...we will be back!

reviews.text: Entertainment...disappointed with some shows, Esp the Glee tribute. Im afraid some of the voices were just off key and a bit harsh on the ears. The Centre stage was like sitting in the epicentre of an earthquake evry time somone ran or even walked by. Other shows were good but inbetween shows has not changed since i was last there. Shame no more competitions.
reviews.title: Great but grim food

reviews.text: My wife and I along with our 9 month old had a really nice time. The hotel is modern and funky and highly recommended.
reviews.title: Had a brilliant time at the Wave Hotel, Butlins, Bognor Regis. Opened Summer 2012

reviews.text: Puppet Castle, Skyline, Jackson Live and Center Stage were all brill. Great food and service at the Beachcomer. Way too much rock salt on the kids meals at Turners and refused to take off the bill!
reviews.title: EXCELLENT TIME

reviews.text: Having not been to Butlins for over 10 yrs what an improvement! Will be booking for next year!
reviews.title: Wave Hotel Bognor

reviews.text: Booked for a silver plus room dining option for midweek 15 Oct and after a fast booking in,saw that we were automatically upgraded to a gold apartment each. Had 2 twin bedrooms, lounge area and kitchen - all clean , all working properly and microwave, dishwasher, fridge etc.
reviews.title: Great for families, something for everyone.

reviews.text: The accomadation in Atlantic bay, jelly grove drive was much better than i had hoped and in a nice area. Ocean Drive was the main restaurant and much smaller than 2 years ago when we went. However still managed to find tables and hardly any queues. The food was above average, had lots of choice and was very tasty- again much better than I could have hoped. Unlike minehead who had hardly any staff at hand , Credit goes to the man with glasses (who does the birthday shouts) and the younger man at the entrance who knew my dad by name and always waved us through. For the price i paid, you could not do better.
reviews.title: Save your £ and take your family elsewhere

reviews.text: This was our third trip to Butlins Bognor Regis, after initial reticence, we quickly became converts. The first time we stayed was in a basic room, the second time the Shoreline hotel, and this time a 2 bedroom silver apartment. All accomodations have been very good but we liked the apartment the best, it was modern, clean and very comfortable and warm.
reviews.title: a great weekend had by all..

reviews.text: The check in was fast and friendly, the premium dining restaurant The Deck was superb, huge choice of meals and excellent quality. One of the guys helping clear the tables was so friendly and helpful and incredibly hard working he deserves a special mention..so thankyou 'John Hill', I hope Butlins recognise and value your commitment and hard work.
reviews.title: butlins bogner regis 4 nite break
Evolved from "Get me out of here" to actually quite good
reviews.text: the entertainment was great fun and of a good quality, especially the wrestling!
We also enjoyed the swimming pool and the staff were working so hard to keep the place clean.
reviews.title: Excellent stay and service!

reviews.text: Well done Butlins! we will return again.
reviews.title: Fantastic week!

aka: Butlins Bognor Regis Hotel Bognor Regis
description: Bognor Regis is officially one of Britain’s sunniest locations, sitting right on the West Sussex coast. Within just a couple of hours drive from London, Butlins Bognor Regis is the perfect getaway. Known as a traditional seaside town, we’ve given it a modern ‘twist’ with two funky hotels; the Ocean Hotel and the Shoreline Hotel. There’s a relaxing spa (ideal for grown-ups) and if you feel like discovering the area around the resort, the South Downs National Park and heritage sites are right on your doorstep.
